citations.desc: Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control.
citations.narrative:
Enclosures are not being spot cleaned daily. There was a build up of feces in multiple enclosures that needs to be
removed. Fecal and food waste must be removed from primary enclosures daily to prevent soiling of the dogs and reduce
odors.
Correct by: April 25, 2024

citations.desc: Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control.
citations.narrative:
Housekeeping at the facility must be addressed. There are empty whelping enclosures with fecal and food waste that
have not been cleaned since the puppies left almost a month ago. Next to these whelping enclosures, there is a grate
over the floor with one inch openings, and under the grate is visible fecal waste, old shavings, used syringe bottles and
dust and debris. These areas of the kennel must be kept cleaned to reduce odors and disease hazards and to facilitate
good housekeeping practices.
Correct by: May 1, 2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.11(a) 
   
Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control.

removed. Fecal and food waste must be removed from primary enclosures daily to prevent soiling of the dogs and reduce 
odors.  
Correct by: April 25, 2024 
3.11(c) 
   
Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control. 
Housekeeping at the facility must be addressed. There are empty whelping enclosures with fecal and food waste that 
have not been cleaned since the puppies left almost a month ago. Next to these whelping enclosures, there is a grate 
over the floor with one inch openings, and under the grate is visible fecal waste, old shavings, used syringe bottles and 
dust and debris. These areas of the kennel must be kept cleaned to reduce odors and disease hazards and to facilitate 
good housekeeping practices.  
Correct by: May 1, 2024 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
